mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cash( member_id , cash_date , cash_kind , category_name, cash_price, cash_place, cash_memo ) VALUE( #{memberId}, #{cashDate}, #{cashKind}, #{categoryName}, #{cashPrice}, #{cashPlace}, #{cashMemo} )
mapper.select: SELECT cash_no as cashNo, category_name as categoryName, cash_kind as cashKind, cash_price as cashPrice, cash_place cashPlace, cash_memo as cashMemo FROM cash WHERE cash_no = #{cashNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE cash SET category_name = #{categoryName}, cash_kind = #{cashKind}, cash_price = #{cashPrice}, cash_place = #{cashPlace}, cash_memo = #{cashMemo} WHERE cash_no = #{cashNo}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price) ,'0') FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_kind = '수입' AND cash_date = #{cashDate}) - (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(cash_price) ,'0') FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_kind = '지출' AND cash_date = #{cashDate}) FROM dual

SELECT cash_no as cashNo, cash_kind as cashKind, category_name as categoryName, cash_price as cashPrice, cash_place as cashPlace, cash_memo as cashMemo FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_date = #{cashDate} ORDER BY cash_no ASC
